page.title: 15News
page.content:
{The Visit of the Queen Mother
The Queen Mother came on Monday 10th June 1985. Mr Robert Dorrien-Smith, lessee of Tresco,asked Mr. Kirk,our Headteacher, if the boys and girls from Tresco School would like to dance for the Queen Mother. We were delighted to dance for such a kind and royal lady. There were camers from ITV and lots and lots of people. She was coming down the road. She was all in blue. On her hat there was a blue rose. Rachel, my friend, gave her some flowers and James announced the dances. Then it all happened.
